感谢您成为 Ghacks 的读者。 升级到 WatchOS 9.5 之前三思而后行的帖子最先出现在gHacks 技术新闻上。

;

急于将设备更新到 watchOS 9.5 的 Apple Watch 爱好者可能会遇到一个不受欢迎的惊喜。虽然这个最新的软件版本引入了 Pride Celebration 表盘并承诺修复错误，但它似乎给许多用户带来了令人讨厌的显示问题。

到达 reddits r/AppleWatch和r/watchOS时，越来越多的抱怨揭示了一种突出的绿色/灰色调现在正在影响屏幕，在原本充满活力的 OLED 显示器上投下了一种不受欢迎的色调。这个新发现的问题已经成为 Apple Watch 用户的眼中钉，带来意想不到的挫折。

watchOS 9.5带来视觉失真和颜色不一致

watchOS 9.5 更新引发的视觉偏差表现为侵入性的绿色/灰色色调，显着改变了受影响的 Apple Watch 屏幕上的色彩再现。充斥在线社区的报告展示了令人沮丧的影响，曾经清晰生动的 OLED 显示屏现在显得褪色了。

用户分享了照片来说明这个问题，揭示了这个破坏性错误的严重程度。虽然功能完好无损，但不可否认， Apple Watch佩戴者目睹他们珍爱的时计的视觉性能下降，这无疑是令人不安的。

值得注意的是，这个显示问题的强度似乎在不同的 Apple Watch 型号之间波动，导致不同程度的绿色/灰色调。一些用户报告说效果更柔和，变色不那么明显，而其他用户则在应对无法忽视的明显颜色失真。

因此，该错误的严重性给受影响的个人带来了额外的挫败感，因为他们正在考虑这个缺陷对他们 Apple Watch 体验的影响程度。

所有几代 Apple Watch 都受到影响

Apple Watch 漏洞的影响范围深远，因为它不仅影响老一代人，也影响到新发布的 Apple Watch Series 8。来自无数在线帖子的证词及其随后的评论部分表明，Apple Watch 各个版本的用户都有成为这种显示异常的牺牲品。从初代Apple Watch到最新的 Series 8，经证明，没有一款机型能够免受 watchOS 9.5 更新引起的着色问题的影响。

值得注意的是，在众多受影响的设备中，迄今为止出现了一个值得注意的例外：Apple Watch Ultra。虽然还没有关于这个受 bug 影响的特定变体的报告浮出水面，但 Apple Watch Ultra 用户仍需保持谨慎，因为他们遇到这个令人烦恼的显示缺陷并非完全不可想象。

我们建议您在 Apple 推出修补程序之前不要将watchOS更新到版本 9.5。

;

三星通过其高度机密的项目在科技界引起轰动，该项目旨在将ChromeOS的强大功能与 DeX 界面的多功能性结合起来。通过整合这两种技术，三星力求打造突破性的混合笔记本电脑体验。由于该项目目前处于保密状态，可用信息有限，但相信三星将利用其基于 5 纳米或 7 纳米节点的 Exynos SoC 来提供卓越的性能和无缝连接。

DeXBook 的复兴

三星的项目重新点燃了技术爱好者的热情，带回了DeXBook的概念，该概念直到现在仍未实现。与市场上现有的 DeX 坞站相比，DeXBook 旨在提供一种更加集成的方法。 DeX 已经作为三星的专有软件，促进了 Galaxy 智能手机、显示器和电视之间的连接，DeXBook 旨在消除对电缆、应用程序安装和系留设备的需求，为用户提供无线和身临其境的体验。

以用户体验为目标

三星项目的一个有趣方面是在 ChromeOS 生态系统中实施 DeX。从 Windows-DeX 版本中汲取灵感，它在类似 Windows UI 中的 OneUI 的单独窗口中运行，可以想象 DeXBook 将采用类似的方法。此设置使用户能够享受熟悉的 ChromeOS 环境，同时利用 DeX 界面的生产力和多功能性。

然而，怀疑论者质疑 DeXBook 带来的附加值。 ChromeOS 即将推出的 Phone Hub 功能允许从智能手机流式传输应用程序，再加上 DeX/OneUI 和 ChromeOS 都支持 Android 应用程序这一事实，可能会减少在 ChromeOS 环境中对 OneUI 模拟器的需求。虽然 DeX 在连接到外部显示器时已经证明了它的实用性，但它在这种情况下的有效性可能会在用户采用方面面临挑战。

随着三星的秘密项目继续展开，科技界热切期待有关 ChromeOS 和 DeX 集成的更多细节。这种创新合作有可能重新定义用户与笔记本电脑和设备的交互方式，提供无缝和互连的体验。请继续关注这一可能塑造技术未来的激动人心的发展动态。

经过两年多的广泛测试阶段，前 Apple 工程师 Neil Jhaveri 正式发布了他的 Mac 电子邮件应用程序，名为 Mimestream。 Jhaveri 在 Apple 任职七年多，特别是为第一款 iPad 的 Mail 应用程序和 macOS 的初始 Notes 应用程序的开发做出了贡献，最终领导团队致力于增强 Apple 的 Mail 应用程序。他于 2017 年离开 Apple，于 2019 年创立了 Mimestream。

目前专门支持Gmail 的Mimestream利用 Gmail 的 API 进行无缝集成。虽然该应用程序的兼容性目前仅限于 Gmail 帐户，但 Jhaveri 和他的团队打算在未来扩大其覆盖范围。尽管是一个相对较小的操作，只有五个人参与，但 Mimestream 在其测试阶段就引起了人们的关注，吸引了超过 167,000 名渴望体验其功能的用户。 Jhaveri 强调，公司在继续完善和推进 Mimestream 的功能时，仍保持自筹资金，保持其独立性。-

Neil Jhaveri 借鉴了他使用 Apple 的 Mail 应用程序的经验，在 Mimestream 中加入了类似于默认 Mac 应用程序的设计元素。其中包括熟悉的功能，例如使用蓝点表示未读电子邮件、三列布局以及方便地放置在顶部栏中的操作按钮。作为原生应用程序，Mimestream 与 macOS 无缝集成，确保了一致的用户体验。该应用采用触控板手势，支持深色主题，允许用户将电子邮件配置文件链接到 Focus Filters，并提供可自定义的键盘快捷键。

Mimestream 由 Gmail API 提供支持

Mimestream 使用 Gmail API 的功能，可以轻松导入各种元素，例如签名、服务器端过滤器、模板、标签和假期回复。此外，该应用程序还扩展了对 Gmail 别名、提及、代码块、Markdown 替换、撤消发送功能以及发送和存档电子邮件的能力的支持。这种与 Gmail API 的深度集成增强了 Mimestream 的整体体验，使其更接近 Gmail 网络界面的功能和熟悉度。

随着新的发布，Mimestream 还将支持“工作”和“个人”等配置文件，以便您可以分离不同的帐户。您还可以为帐户分配不同的颜色，以在统一视图中区分电子邮件。另外，您可以设置通知时间表，这样您就不会被不必要的通知打扰。

该应用程序还具有一个额外的菜单栏——当您单击菜单栏图标时，您可以在不打开该应用程序的情况下快速检查是否有任何未读消息。

您可以通过 14 天的试用免费使用 Mimestream。之后，您必须支付 4.99 美元/月或 49.99 美元/年。然而，这家初创公司提供的年度计划在 6 月 9 日之前的第一年以 29.99 美元的折扣价推出。Mimestream 正在与其他电子邮件客户端竞争，例如 Boxy、Edison Mail 和前 Google 高管的应用程序 Shortwave。它依靠 Mac 用户简单熟悉的界面以及与 Gmail 的紧密集成从竞争中脱颖而出。

在最近的公告中，谷歌推出了一项新的 Android 漏洞赏金计划，邀请技术娴熟的个人将他们的专业知识用于测试，并有可能获得丰厚的奖励。该计划承诺为那些能够发现和报告 Android 操作系统中的安全漏洞的人提供慷慨的奖励，可能高达数万美元。

我们很高兴地宣布推出新的移动 VRP！我们正在寻找漏洞猎手来帮助我们查找和修复移动应用程序中的漏洞。 https://t.co/HDs1hnGpbH

- Google VRP（Google Bug Hunters）（@GoogleVRP） 2023 年 5 月 22 日

在计划摘要中概述，Google 的此移动 VRP（漏洞奖励计划）的主要重点在于第一方 Android 应用程序。目标是识别和解决这些应用程序中的漏洞，最终确保用户数据的安全。通过鼓励研究人员发现潜在的缺陷，Google 旨在加强其 Android 生态系统的稳健性并保护其用户的隐私。

To accomplish this, Photoshop selectively sends portions of a given image to Firefly for processing, rather than the entire image, although the company is also actively exploring the potential of employing the entire image. Subsequently, a new layer is created within Photoshop to accommodate the generated results.

As per TechCrunch 's report, Maria Yap, the Vice President of Digital Imaging at Adobe, provided me with an exclusive demonstration of these new features ahead of today's official announcement. As is customary with generative AI technology, predicting the precise output of the model can be challenging, but some of the results were surprisingly impressive.

Nintendo is currently grappling with a class action lawsuit centered around its contentious practice of in-game loot boxes. Commonly referred to as the "gacha pipe" system, these microtransactions involved charging players real money in exchange for a chance at obtaining virtual advantages. Despite discontinuing the randomized system in October 2022, Nintendo continues to face criticism for its approach.

The lawsuit, initially filed last month, has now escalated to the federal level through the California State Court. The plaintiffs allege that Nintendo's in-game transactions in the popular mobile racing game, Mario Kart Tour, were deceptive, illegal, and morally objectionable, violating consumer protection laws.

Mario Kart Tour's loot box controversy

For a significant period, Mario Kart Tour, a freemium mobile game particularly popular among young gamers, utilized a luck-based system known as the "Spotlight Pipe" or "gacha pipe". This feature enticed players to spend in-game currency, known as "Rubies," for a chance to acquire new gliders, karts, or characters that would enhance their in-game performance.

However, each attempt to obtain these rewards, commonly referred to as a "pull," required players to spend five Rubies, roughly equivalent to $3 USD. Such loot box mechanics have faced intense scrutiny due to concerns about their predatory nature, particularly when targeting vulnerable audiences. Recognizing the backlash surrounding this practice, Nintendo decided to discontinue the gacha pipe in October 2022 and introduced a more transparent in-game store, although it still involved paid transactions. It is worth noting that other gaming companies have also recently moved away from similar loot box systems.

Allegations of unauthorized expenditure

During the period between 2021 and 2022, before the discontinuation of the gacha pipe, the lead plaintiff, a minor, allegedly made unauthorized charges amounting to over $170 on his father's credit card through Mario Kart Tour's loot box feature. While cases exist where players have incurred significantly higher bills through comparable mechanisms, the plaintiff and his father have legitimate grounds for concern.

GamesIndustry.biz reports that Nintendo generated an estimated $293 million in revenue from Mario Kart Tour between 2019 and 2022. The legal filing contends that the plaintiff rarely received valuable rewards from the purchased Spotlight Pipes, and he would not have made such in-game purchases had he been aware of the true odds of obtaining rewards or the absence of a refund policy. Despite attempts by Gizmodo to obtain Nintendo's comment on the matter, the company has not responded as of the time of publication.

The wider legal landscape of in-game purchases

This lawsuit is part of a broader pattern of legal challenges targeting video game companies regarding contentious in-game purchase systems. Major industry players such as Google, Apple, and Valve Corp. have faced legal complaints related to their promotion and implementation of microtransaction systems that closely resemble gambling.

However, thus far, these companies have largely emerged victorious in such cases, according to an analysis by JD Supra. A Canadian court recently dismissed a lawsuit against Electronic Arts (EA Games), ruling that loot boxes did not constitute "unlawful gambling".

Gaming companies worldwide have also faced increased scrutiny and investigations by regulatory bodies due to the use of loot box mechanics. In a notable case, Epic Games , the creator of Fortnite, was fined hundreds of millions of dollars, partly due to its methods of encouraging young users to spend money.

Knox Matrix

The main idea behind Knox Matrix is to move security from the device level to the ecosystem level. Instead of relying on protections for each device individually, Knox Matrix unifies security on the ecosystem level.

Samsung notes that more and more devices have connectivity, from smartphones and other mobile devices to televisions, refrigerators, solar panels or robot vacuum cleaners. More devices make for greater risks, as each individual device may have security issues that criminals may exploit.

While single-device protections will remain an essential part in security, Samsung believes that this form of protection is not well suited to keep up. Exploitation of one device in an ecosystem might lead to attacks against other devices that the customer or business owns.

Knox Matrix creates a trusted network that all devices that support the feature are connected to. If a device in the network is attacked successfully, Know Matrix will immediately isolate the device so that it can't be used to attack other devices in the same ecosystem.

Samsung claims that security gets stronger the more devices a user has connected to the trusted network.

Know Matrix offers three critical features that "ensure its success" according to Samsung:

  • Credential Sync protects user data while it is moved between devices.

Knox Matrix uses a private blockchain "allowing compatible devices to check each other for breaches and ensure safety with intelligent threat monitoring".

Samsung admits that development is challenging, mainly because of the number of different types of products, operating systems and security standards. The company plans to alert users about "potentially unsafe situations", mentioning the use of old firmware specifically.
